name: Djikstra's Enigmatic Puzzle Cube
description:
Djikstra's Enigmatic Puzzle Cube is a puzzle game inspired by 2048 and Rubik's Cubes.

Combine adjacent elements together: you can merge them upward, downward, leftward, or rightward on the front face of the cube. Standard combinations can be merged if the elements are the same and their scores are equal. Special combinations can be merged by combining together two elements of the same tier. Find the special combinations by playing and experimenting! Discover rare combinations requiring unique arrangements of cubes!

FEATURES

Leaderboards

Play to achieve a high score on our leaderboards, each leaderboard for different cube arrangements!

Cube Sizes

Choose your cube size and hit the reset button to restart the game with a smaller or larger cube! You can go from 4x4x4 to 8x8x8.

Achievements

Unlock achievements spanning from simple discoveries to elaborate chains or unique rare combinations, demonstrating your geometric puzzle skills!

Regular Updates

Check in frequently for new content updates, including: alternate game modes, seasonal graphic sets, and new special cube combinations!
